mapper.delete:
delete from stock_weiwai where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT count( 0 ) FROM ( SELECT id, righttg, lefttg, mfrsid, depart_name AS mirorAddress, company_id, store_num, left_right, process_ask, goods_num, store_name, goods_code, store_count, classtype, store_describe, sale_number, member_number, NAME, phone_1, eye_type, settle_date, sale_name, amount_money, recipel_type, rightsph, leftsph, rightcyl, leftcyl, rightzx, leftzx, rightAdd, leftAdd, rightSlja, leftSlja, rightJd, leftJd, rightFartj, leftFartj, rightNeartj, leftNeartj FROM ( SELECT sa.id, sa.righttg, sa.lefttg, de.depart_name, m.company_id, sa.mfrsid, sa.sale_type, sa.store_num, sa.left_right, sa.process_ask, sa.goods_num, sa.store_name, sa.goods_code, sa.store_count, sa.classtype, sa.store_describe, sa.sale_number, sa.member_number, m.NAME, m.phone_1, sa.eye_type, sa.peijing_time AS settle_date, sa.sale_name, sa.amount_money, sa.recipel_type, k.kjjy_prescription_type AS chufangType, k.kjjy_optometry_name AS yangsName, k.kjjy_sphod AS rightsph, k.kjjy_sphos AS leftsph, k.kjjy_cylod AS rightcyl, k.kjjy_cylos AS leftcyl, k.kjjy_axialod AS rightzx, k.kjjy_axialos AS leftzx, '' AS rightAdd, '' AS leftAdd, k.kjjy_prismod AS rightSlja, k.kjjy_prismos AS leftSlja, k.kjjy_jdod AS rightJd, k.kjjy_jdos AS leftJd, k.kjjy_yytjod AS rightFartj, k.kjjy_yytjos AS leftFartj, '' AS rightNeartj, '' AS leftNeartj FROM jc_kjjy k JOIN store_sales sa ON sa.ptometry_number = k.ptometry_number JOIN member m ON sa.member_number = m.card_number JOIN department de ON sa.store_num = de.id UNION SELECT sa.id, sa.righttg, sa.lefttg, de.depart_name, m.company_id, sa.mfrsid, sa.sale_type, sa.store_num, sa.left_right, sa.process_ask, sa.goods_num, sa.store_name, sa.goods_code, sa.store_count, sa.classtype, sa.store_describe, sa.sale_number, sa.member_number, m.NAME, m.phone_1, sa.eye_type, sa.peijing_time AS settle_date, sa.sale_name, sa.amount_money, sa.recipel_type, ky.kjyy_prescription_type AS chufangType, ky.kjyy_optometry_name AS yangsName, ky.kjyy_sphod AS rightsph, ky.kjyy_sphos AS leftsph, ky.kjyy_cylod AS rightcyl, ky.kjyy_cylos AS leftcyl, ky.kjyy_axialod AS rightzx, ky.kjyy_axialos AS leftzx, '' AS rightAdd, '' AS leftAdd, ky.kjyy_prismod AS rightSlja, ky.kjyy_prismos AS leftSlja, ky.kjyy_jdod AS rightJd, ky.kjyy_jdos AS leftJd, ky.kjyy_yytjod AS rightFartj, ky.kjyy_yytjos AS leftFartj, '' AS rightNeartj, '' AS leftNeartj FROM jc_kjyy ky JOIN store_sales sa ON sa.ptometry_number = ky.ptometry_number JOIN member m ON sa.member_number = m.card_number JOIN department de ON sa.store_num = de.id UNION SELECT sa.id, sa.righttg, sa.lefttg, de.depart_name, m.company_id, sa.mfrsid, sa.sale_type, sa.store_num, sa.left_right, sa.process_ask, sa.goods_num, sa.store_name, sa.goods_code, sa.store_count, sa.classtype, sa.store_describe, sa.sale_number, sa.member_number, m.NAME, m.phone_1, sa.eye_type, sa.peijing_time AS settle_date, sa.sale_name, sa.amount_money, sa.recipel_type, sg.sgjj_prescription_type AS chufangType, sg.sgjj_optometry_name AS yangsname, sg.sgjj_sphod AS rightsph, sg.sgjj_sphos AS leftsph, sg.sgjj_cylod AS rightcyl, sg.sgjj_cylos AS leftcyl, sg.sgjj_axialod AS rightzx, sg.sgjj_axialos AS leftzx, sg.sgjj_addod AS rightAdd, sg.sgjj_addos AS leftAdd, '' AS rightSlja, '' AS leftSlja, '' AS rightJd, '' AS leftJd, sg.sgjj_yytjod AS rightFartj, sg.sgjj_yytjos AS leftFartj, sg.sgjj_jytjod AS rightNeartj, sg.sgjj_jytjos AS leftNeartj FROM jc_sgjj sg JOIN store_sales sa ON sa.ptometry_number = sg.ptometry_number JOIN member m ON sa.member_number = m.card_number JOIN department de ON sa.store_num = de.id UNION SELECT sa.id, sa.righttg, sa.lefttg, de.depart_name, m.company_id, sa.mfrsid, sa.sale_type, sa.store_num, sa.left_right, sa.process_ask, sa.goods_num, sa.store_name, sa.goods_code, sa.store_count, sa.classtype, sa.store_describe, sa.sale_number, sa.member_number, m.NAME, m.phone_1, sa.eye_type, sa.peijing_time AS settle_date, sa.sale_name, sa.amount_money, sa.recipel_type, z.zy_prescription_type AS chufangType, z.zy_optometry_name AS yangsname, z.zy_sphod AS rightsph, z.zy_sphos AS leftsph, z.zy_cylod AS rightcyl, z.zy_cylos AS leftcyl, z.zy_axialod AS rightzx, z.zy_axialos AS leftzx, '' AS rightAdd, '' AS leftAdd, z.zy_prismod AS rightSlja, z.zy_prismos AS leftSlja, z.zy_jdod AS rightJd, z.zy_jdos AS leftJd, '' AS rightFartj, '' AS leftFartj, '' AS rightNeartj, '' AS leftNeartj FROM jc_zy z JOIN store_sales sa ON sa.ptometry_number = z.ptometry_number JOIN member m ON sa.member_number = m.card_number JOIN department de ON sa.store_num = de.id UNION SELECT sa.id, sa.righttg, sa.lefttg, de.depart_name, m.company_id, sa.mfrsid, sa.sale_type, sa.store_num, sa.left_right, sa.process_ask, sa.goods_num, sa.store_name, sa.goods_code, sa.store_count, sa.classtype, sa.store_describe, sa.sale_number, sa.member_number, m.NAME, m.phone_1, sa.eye_type, sa.peijing_time AS settle_date, sa.sale_name, sa.amount_money, sa.recipel_type, x.rx_prescription_type AS chufangType, x.rx_optometry_name AS yangsname, x.rx_sphod AS rightsph, x.rx_sphos AS leftsph, x.rx_cylod AS rightcyl, x.rx_cylos AS leftcyl, x.rx_axialod AS rightzx, x.rx_axialos AS leftzx, '' AS rightAdd, '' AS leftAdd, '' AS rightSlja, '' AS leftSlja, '' AS rightJd, '' AS leftJd, '' AS rightFartj, '' AS leftFartj, '' AS rightNeartj, '' AS leftNeartj FROM jc_rxjmjcj x LEFT JOIN store_sales sa ON sa.ptometry_number = x.ptometry_number LEFT JOIN member m ON sa.member_number = m.card_number JOIN department de ON sa.store_num = de.id UNION SELECT sa.id, sa.righttg, sa.lefttg, de.depart_name, m.company_id, sa.mfrsid, sa.sale_type, sa.store_num, sa.left_right, sa.process_ask, sa.goods_num, sa.store_name, sa.goods_code, sa.store_count, sa.classtype, sa.store_describe, sa.sale_number, sa.member_number, m.NAME, m.phone_1, sa.eye_type, sa.peijing_time AS settle_date, sa.sale_name, sa.amount_money, sa.recipel_type, sx.sjxl_prescription_type AS chufangType, sx.sjxl_optometry_name AS yangsname, sx.sjxl_sphod AS rightsph, sx.sjxl_sphos AS leftsph, sx.sjxl_cylod AS rightcyl, sx.sjxl_cylos AS leftcyl, sx.sjxl_axialod AS rightzx, sx.sjxl_axialos AS leftzx, '' AS rightAdd, '' AS leftAdd, sx.sjxl_sljod AS rightSlja, sx.sjxl_sljos AS leftSlja, sx.sjxl_jdod AS rightJd, sx.sjxl_jdos AS leftJd, sx.sjxl_yytjod AS rightFartj, sx.sjxl_yytjos AS leftFartj, sx.sjxl_jytjod AS rightNeartj, sx.sjxl_jytjos AS leftNeartj FROM jc_sjxl sx JOIN store_sales sa ON sa.ptometry_number = sx.ptometry_number JOIN member m ON sa.member_number = m.card_number JOIN department de ON sa.store_num = de.id UNION SELECT sa.id, sa.righttg, sa.lefttg, de.depart_name, m.company_id, sa.mfrsid, sa.sale_type, sa.store_num, sa.left_right, sa.process_ask, sa.goods_num, sa.store_name, sa.goods_code, sa.store_count, sa.classtype, sa.store_describe, sa.sale_number, sa.member_number, m.NAME, m.phone_1, sa.eye_type, sa.peijing_time AS settle_date, sa.sale_name, sa.amount_money, sa.recipel_type, rg.rgp_prescription_type AS chufangType, rg.rgp_optometry_name AS yangsname, rg.rgp_sphod AS rightsph, rg.rgp_sphos AS leftsph, rg.rgp_cylod AS rightcyl, rg.rgp_cylos AS leftcyl, rg.rgp_axialod AS rightzx, rg.rgp_axialos AS leftzx, '' AS rightAdd, '' AS leftAdd, '' AS rightSlja, '' AS leftSlja, '' AS rightJd, '' AS leftJd, '' AS rightFartj, '' AS leftFartj, '' AS rightNeartj, '' AS leftNeartj FROM jc_rgp rg JOIN store_sales sa ON sa.ptometry_number = rg.ptometry_number JOIN member m ON sa.member_number = m.card_number JOIN department de ON sa.store_num = de.id UNION SELECT sa.id, sa.righttg, sa.lefttg, de.depart_name, m.company_id, sa.mfrsid, sa.sale_type, sa.store_num, sa.left_right, sa.process_ask, sa.goods_num, sa.store_name, sa.goods_code, sa.store_count, sa.classtype, sa.store_describe, sa.sale_number, sa.member_number, m.NAME, m.phone_1, sa.eye_type, sa.peijing_time AS settle_date, sa.sale_name, sa.amount_money, sa.recipel_type, vs.vst_prescription_type AS chufangType, vs.vst_optometry_name AS yangsname, vs.vst_sphod AS rightsph, vs.vst_sphos AS leftsph, vs.vst_cylod AS rightcyl, vs.vst_cylos AS leftcyl, vs.vst_axialod AS rightzx, vs.vst_axialos AS leftzx, '' AS rightAdd, '' AS leftAdd, '' AS rightSlja, '' AS leftSlja, '' AS rightJd, '' AS leftJd, vs.vst_vaod AS rightFartj, vs.vst_vaos AS leftFartj, '' AS rightNeartj, '' AS leftNeartj FROM jc_vst vs JOIN store_sales sa ON sa.ptometry_number = vs.ptometry_number JOIN member m ON sa.member_number = m.card_number JOIN department de ON sa.store_num = de.id UNION SELECT sa.id, sa.righttg, sa.lefttg, de.depart_name, m.company_id, sa.mfrsid, sa.sale_type, sa.store_num, sa.left_right, sa.process_ask, sa.goods_num, sa.store_name, sa.goods_code, sa.store_count, sa.classtype, sa.store_describe, sa.sale_number, sa.member_number, m.NAME, m.phone_1, sa.eye_type, sa.peijing_time AS settle_date, sa.sale_name, sa.amount_money, sa.recipel_type, cr.crt_prescription_type AS chufangType, cr.crt_optometry_name AS yangsname, cr.crt_sphod AS rightsph, cr.crt_sphos AS leftsph, cr.crt_cylod AS rightcyl, cr.crt_cylos AS leftcyl, cr.crt_axialod AS rightzx, cr.crt_axialos AS leftzx, '' AS rightAdd, '' AS leftAdd, '' AS rightSlja, '' AS leftSlja, '' AS rightJd, '' AS leftJd, cr.crt_vaod AS rightFartj, cr.crt_vaod AS leftFartj, '' AS rightNeartj, '' AS leftNeartj FROM jc_crt cr JOIN store_sales sa ON sa.ptometry_number = cr.ptometry_number JOIN member m ON sa.member_number = m.card_number JOIN department de ON sa.store_num = de.id ) aia
and FIND_IN_SET(#{classtype},classtype) and FIND_IN_SET(#{mfrsid},mfrsid) and FIND_IN_SET(eye_type,#{eyeStyles}) and store_num = #{departNumber} and sale_type = #{saleType} and company_id = #{companyId}
and sale_number LIKE concat(concat('%', #{saleNumber}),'%') and name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{name}),'%') and memberNumber LIKE concat(concat('%', #{memberNumber}),'%') and phone1 LIKE concat(concat('%', #{phone1}),'%')
group by sale_number ORDER BY id DESC ) AS temp

SELECT * FROM stock_weiwai WHERE CONCAT(danju_number,sale_number) IN
#{arrys}
select b.brandnum,b.brandname ,jpdz.view_good_name from aa_jpdz jpdz join c_brand b on jpdz.mfrsid=b.mfrsid and jpdz.brandnum=b.brandnum where jpdz.produc_num = #{value}
select code,count from stock_weiwai where danju_number = #{danjuNumber}
